name: Tutorial 11 - Choice
definition:
Usable within macros and tables
[[CHOICE:Nothing here:((1d20x<<USERNAME.table.tutorial-2-gems>>)):A <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-1-colours>> cow, standing next to a <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-1-colours>> beanstalk.]]

CHOICE is followed by a number of colon separated options. One of which will be picked.
